title: Shift

Description :
        Shift, at manhwawebsiteDetective Lee Chang,' who lost his family overnight due to an accident. The only family left to him is Chae-rin,' who inherited her sister's rare disease. Ten years ago, he sought the Cheonryeong Church, which had shown a miracle in curing his sister's illness, but the last hopethe church leaderwas found dead.Maybe you like !
